WHY CANT HE TELL ME??

Take some time and actually read this
this is a guy talking...

It's 7th grade...

I stared at the girl next to me...She was my so called "best friend"...I stared at her...Long, silky hair...and i wished she was mine...but she didnt notice me like that...i knew it...after class she walked up to me and asked me for the notes she had missed the day before...and i handed them to her...she said "thanks"... and gave me a kiss on the cheek...i wanted to tell her...i wanted her to know that i dont want to be "just friends"...i love her but i'm too shy to tell her...and i dont know why...

Its senior year...

the day before prom...she walked to my locker... "my date is sick" she said...he's not going to go... well...i didnt have a date and in 7th grade...we made a promise that if neither of us had dates...we'd go together just as "best friends"...and so we did...

Its prom night...

after everything was over with...i was standing at her front door step...i stared at her...she smiled at me...i wanted her to be mine...but she doesnt think of me like that...and i know it...then she said "i had the best time...thanks!" ... and she gave me a kiss on the cheek...i wanted to tell her...i wanted her to know that i dont want to be "just friends"... i love her but i'm just too shy... and i dont know why...

Its graduation day...

a day passed... and then a week... and then a month... before i could blink... it was graduation day... i watched her...perfect body... floated like an angel up on stage to get her diploma... i wanted her to be mine... but she doesnt think of me that way... and i know it... before everyone went home... she came to me in her smock and hat... and cried as i hugged her... then she lifted her head from my shoulders and said "you're my best friend"... "Thanks!"... and gave me a kiss on the cheek... i wanted to tell her... i wanted her to know that i wanted to be more than "just friends"... i love her buti'm too shy to tell her... and i dont know why...

Its a few years later...

Now i sit in the pews of the church... A church that she is getting married in now... i watched her say "i do" and drive off to her new life... married to another man... i wanted her to be mine... but she didnt see me like that... and i knew it... but before she drove away... she came to me and said "you came!... Thanks!"... and she kissed me on the cheek... i wanted to tell her... i wanted her to know that i didnt want to be "just friends"... i love her but i'm just too shy... and i dont know why...

Years passed...

I looked down at the coffin of a girl who used to be my "best friend"... at the service they read a diary entry she had wrote in her high school years... this is what it said... "I stare at him wishing he was mine, but he doesnt notice me like thatand i know it. i wanted to tell him, i wanted him to know that i dont want to be "just friends" i love him but im just too shy, and i dont know why. i wish he would tell me he loved me"... i wish i did too... i thought to myself and i cried...

GIRL LANGUAGE

GIRL LANGUAGE.

If i dont call you
[ Its because im waiting for you to call me ]

When i walk away from you mad
[ Follow me ]

When i stare at your mouth
[ Kiss me ]

When i push you or hit you
[ Grab me and dont let go ]

When i start cussing at you
[ Kiss me and tell me you love me ]

When im quiet
[ Ask me whats wrong ]

When i ignore you
[ Give me your attention ]

When i pull away
[ Pull me back ]

When you see me at my worst
[ Tell me im beautiful ]

When you see me start crying
[ Hold me and tell me everything will be alright ]

When you see me walking
[ Sneak up and hug my waist from behind ]

If i dont call you
[ Its because im waiting for you to call me ]

When im scared
[ Protect me ]

When i lay my head on your shoulder
[ Tilt my head up and kiss me ]

When i grab at your hands
[ Hold mine and play with my fingers ]

When i tease you
[ Tease me back and make me laugh ]

When i dont answer for a long time
[ reassure me that everything is okay ]

When i look at you with doubt
[ Back yourself up ]

When i say that i like you
[ I really do more than you could understand ]

When i bump into you
[ bump into me back and make me laugh]

When i tell you a secret
[ keep it safe and untold]

When i look at you in your eyes
[ dont look away until i do]

When i miss you
[ im hurting inside ]

When you break my heart
[ the pain never really goes away ]

When i say its over
[ i still want you to be mine ]

When i repost this bulliten
[ I want you to read it ]

REPOST AS GIRL LANGUAGE AND THE LOVE OF YOUR LIFE WILL SURPRISE YOU SOON

Ever notice?

that once you fall in love with a person its hard to ever let them go. Somehow you lived without them your whole life and after they've taken your heart its unbelievably hard to live without them. It almost seems as though they put their own lock on your heart and you have to figure out how to get it off. In the end you can try and hate them all you want but somehow the love you have for them always sticks with you.

Idk...

Do you know when you love somebody and when they hurt you (when they dont mean too) you can never stay mad at them... they always seem to make you smile... and the thing that made you sad or hurt seems so stupid and you dont know why you were crying over it....

Or other times when you love someone so much that it hurts and you start to cry (somewhat in a good way) and you want to stop crying but then again you dont cuz your cry cuz you love them.... idk i just felt like writeing this down...

Why we cry

why guys cry
Boys cry because...

1. Girls screw them over...
2. They just got hit in the balls...
3. They're about to die...
4. Their heart is broken..
5. Because they are true men.

GIRLS: If you see a guy crying, hug him close and hold him up as he gets over the pain of getting kicked in the nuts. Tell him he's not going to die, and if he's crying over a girl... hug him and kiss him and let him know you won't screw him over and break his heart like the last girl did. Guys just want to know that our girls will be there for us to support us when we need them and help us get our mind off the pain of heartbreak, getting kicked in the balls, and knowing we're gonna die.

Girls cry because...

1. They're sad...
2. They're scared...
3. They're nervous...
4. They're frustrated...
5. They're missing someone...
6. They're alone...
7. They're PMSing...
8. They're pregnant..
9. Their heart is broken...
10. They're in love...
11. Their souls have been torn...
12. THEY MET A BOY THEY CANT HAVE...
13. They fell in love with a boy...
14. They hurt so bad inside...
15. They're mad...
16. Something bad happend...
17. JUST BECAUSE THEY FEEL LIKE CRYING

******BOYS: If any girl you know is crying and you see them, don't just stand there and say you're sorry. Hold them and tell them everything will be okay, even if you have no idea what is wrong with them. Girls just want to be held and know that someone cares about them.

Repost this in:

1 minute: you'll be kissed by your lover.

2 minutes: You'll find them in two weeks.

3 minutes: You'll find them in three weeks.

4 minutes: You'll find your true love when you're 90 years old.

5 minutes: You took too damn long and someone else got them.

Im sorry....

Im sorry for all the wrongs i did... The things i did the past the shit i put you and everyone threw...

I didnt mean to do it and i have changed my ways believe it or not....

Im not a bad person im a good person with a good heart that has done bad things and i think even tho it has taken me forever to figure it out but now that i have i have opened my eyes and i see what i really did

What i want to do now idk but whatever is suppost to happen will and were ever i may end up know that im sorry

classring.....

Time....

Time goes by so fast one day your playing around on the playground the next day your on your own. Making choices for yourslef making your own mistakes. I have won some and lost some. Right now i dont care what anyone else says or tells me i want to live my life the way i want and how i picture it. I think that time goes by to fast to fight and hold on to the past whats done is done. Only you know whats best for yourself and only you can make the changes for your future....

Idk im just thinking about my past and how much i missed with my head stuck up in th clouds. What im trying to say is that time will fly. So never wait just do it and never ever look back just keep moving forward....

Why!!!!!

I hate my self so much everyday it gets worse i dont want to feel like this any more!!!

I hate waking up in the middle of the night crying and when im sitting in class waiting for the bell to ring so i can run to the bathroom and cry my eyes out!

I hate it so so sooo much i just want it to end! :"(

Learning..... moving forward.... life....

I think life is about learning thats really all it comes down to in the end is what you have all learns in your life right?
But why does learning have to be so hard for some people some people like me?

I make mistakes yes everyone does but why cant i learn from them am i lonely and so depressed that i dont care anymore what kind of mistakes i make and who i hurt.......
I hate the person that i have become i hate what i have done to people i hate myself for that and i am stuck.... i dont know where to go from here i dont know which path to take.....

Im scared to make a move thinking that i might mess up again..... And looseing everything i have....

How can someone learn in life what to do and how to choose the right thing to do if no ones there to lead them and help them?

I wish i had someone to lead me threw this hard time..... i dont want to feel this way...

I dont want to have health problems i dont want to have depression and every night take a pill and hope that in the morning i will be numb and move threw the day.... or freak out in the middle of the night cuz im having a anxiety attack and have to calm my self down cuz i feel like in having a heart attack

Why is life so much more easy for some people and why do the hard working people that should get everything they want dont......

idk i know i jumped around alot in this blog but this is only a part of whats on my mind

~Love~

“It hurts to love someone and not be loved in return, but what is the most painful is to love someone and never find the courage to let the person know how you feel.”

I love that quote.....

and this one

“It hurts to love someone and not be loved in return, but what is the most painful is to love someone and never find the courage to let the person know how you feel.”

Kids!!!

Ok i mean we all were little kids and we all were mean to at least someone when we were little because we thought they were weird or something but i have just seen the worst

When i ride to school and back for summer school (it sucks) im the oldest kid on the bus and normally i wouldnt pay attention but these girls that were like about to be freshmen were teaching this little kid what a slut is and that she should call herself one or a whore i mean come on really and this girl was laughing and me and a few other kids on the back of the bus were like what the hell???

i just cant get out of my head that today more then ever kids and treating other kids like crap and i dont think were doing enough to stop whats going on today in schools.....

sad sad sad....

~True~

You feel close yet you feel far
you surround me complete me
But you shut me out and throw me aside
me and you are ment to be dont you see
the fear in your eyes say it all
your scared to death even more then me
i dont expect much
just you and me
free as can be
like a bird flying over the sea
wings spread flying, soaring,diving
carefree
the life i see isnt so carefree
it hurts my heart and tears it apart
i know me and you could never be
will never be
i want you to know how i feel
the true me
the me i once knew
the me that you once loved
im a stupid girl who deserves nothing
nothing at all
i tricked you
i lied to you
i hurt you
I put you through hell
you took everything
every word, every action
you took it all
you stayed true to yourself
you stayed true to me
I loved you
my love for you so warm
It felt to good like the suns rays beating down
on my skin
soking in every last drop
the love you gave me
you picked me
we shared something that was unexplanable
untouchable
we felt like one
we were to high in the sky
that what we shared didnt feel real
I want you to understand
I want you to see
the true me......

Jail Time!

I want to get some other peoples ideas about my life and how i can move on from it.....

First off my father molested me and raped my sister

Were going to court in three different countys for it (one out of state)

I have lost many friends because of it....

Because i told on my father my little brother wont have a father there for prolly the rest of his life even tho i know it was the right thing to do

I didnt graduate with my class i have to go for another year because of all the stress my father has caused me and my family school became to much for me

Im on so many different med just to deal with the pain and emotional stress my father has caused me

I have grained 42 pounds in 9 months

I have almost lost all hope

Im scared that we dont have enough evidence to put him away

My dad is crazy and is having someone watch are house and that is following us around to know where we are....

Court is in a week and im so scared that his going to be found not guilty

He was charged with the samething in 1994 with my older sisters and was found not guilty

I just want to get my life back to normal i dont want to feel ugly and worthless and depressed all the time i just need some ideas........

My Father found not guilty for hurting me and my sister!

Man found not guilty of sexual assault
4:52 PM, Jun. 30, 2011
Written by
Sheboygan Press staff Filed Under
Local News

A Sheboygan County jury on Thursday found an Adell man not guilty of having sexual contact with two young girls several years ago.

Donald W. Arendt, 50, had been charged with two counts of sexual assault of a child under 13 years of age, each of which carries a maximum penalty of 40 years in prison, and one count of intimidation of a victim, a misdemeanor for which he could have been jailed for nine months.

The jury of eight men and four women deliberated for more than six hours Thursday after hearing a day and a half of testimony and closing arguments.

Arendt, of N1434 Highway 28, was charged in October.

According to a criminal complaint, one girl, then 17, told a social worker and a Sheboygan police detective last fall that Arendt had sexual contact with her in Sheboygan when she was in kindergarten between September 1998 and June 1999.

When the girl told her younger sister that she was reporting the incident to the police, the younger girl said Arendt had sexually assaulted her, as well, as recently as 2008.

When the first girl telephoned Arendt about the assaults, he denied any sexual activity and threatened to take legal action against her and her mother, adding that he didn’t think she’d “survive it.”

Assistant District Attorney Joel Urmanski said he was disappointed by the jury’s verdict and said the prosecution’s case would have been helped if he’d been allowed by Judge James Bolgert to introduce evidence that assaults had occurred in other counties and that an expert on delayed disclosure had been allowed to testify.

“We knew going in this would be a difficult case,” he said.

Arendt’s defense attorney, Public Defender June Spoerl, declined to comment.

The girls who leveled the charges left the courtroom in tears when the verdict was read. They and family members declined to comment.

Love and trust

Im about to be done with love it feels like everything is being pulled away from me and my life is changeing so much i cant even see whats happening. I want to be loved for who i am and not what other people think i should be. So far people that i thought i could trust or love or would always would be there for me are gone and i cant help but have the feeling that this is going to be happening alot more and then ill have no one. I just feel like giving up

I dont know i just cant get over everything thats happend for the past few years......

Sorry just kinda saying whats on my mind it might not make since to any of you but eh....

Feeling of summer

Summer time is a wonderful time to run, skip and fly
On swings right up into the lucid sky
Dancing in the warm summer rain
With your friends laughing with you by your side
Laying in the grass feeling the breeze through your hair
Walking around bare foot feeling the earth touching you
Summer is the time is a time of freedom
The time for fun
The time to live

Having Faith

Faith is an extraordinary word full of emotion, strength and courage. Time can not shake it words can not destroy it. All people have faith whether they know it of not. It is as simple as putting trust in a friend or as complex as having faith in god. As we grow older it seems that the faith that we have for the larger things in life seem to be fading. As children we has faith that santa claus would leave presents for us underneath the christmas tree for us. As teenagers we have faith the we will attain your license, get a car and graduate high school. Now that were older we have lost faith in our government, in our leader, in the people around us and most importantly in our self's.Faith is what keeps us going: it's what gets us out of bed in the morning. Life without faith would be no life at all. You don't see the moon during the day but the doesn't mean it isn't there. I think that faith is the strongest word that we humans use.
